text: Malik Müller (born January 24, 1994) is a German professional basketball player for Hamburg Towers of the German Basketball Bundesliga. ==Professional career== In the 2015 offseason, Müller signed a three-year deal with Brose Bamberg.Brose Bamberg announces rookie Malik Muller until 2018 On December 11, 2017, he parted ways with Bamberg.Brose Bamberg, Malik Muller part ways The next day he signed with BG Göttingen for the rest of the season.Müller wechselt nach Göttingen – Simon nicht mehr im Kader ==International career== Born in Frankfurt, Germany,Virginia Tech profile Müller was a part of the German U-17, U-18 and U-20 national team.Euroleague player profile ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Baunach Young Pikes players Category:BG Göttingen players Category:Brose Bamberg players Category:German expatriate basketball people in the United States Category:German men's basketball players Category:Hamburg Towers players Category:Riesen Ludwigsburg players Category:Shooting guards Category:Sportspeople from Frankfurt Category:Virginia Tech Hokies men's basketball players
title: Malik Müller
